document_data.name: Tenebrous Worm
document_data.mainbody: '''Tenebrous worms''' were massive insects native to the [[Shadowfell|demi-plane of Shadow]].
document_data.Description: Tenebrous worms looked like giant caterpillars. Their body was covered in coarse bristles. It had a set of large, sharp mandibles.
document_data.Combat: Tenebrous worms attacked a target with its large mandibles, delivering a lethal poison. The bristles that covered their upper body were coated with the same kind of poison. Any creature who came into contact with the poison required ''[[neutralize poison]]'' or ''[[slow poison]]'' spells to be cured, otherwise they died.

Ecology.Habitat: Tenebrous worms could be found in the forests of the [[Shadowfell|demi-plane of Shadow]]. and the [[Cathedral of Emerald Scales|Shrouded Jungle]].
Ecology.Relationships: These creatures were a [[favored monster]] of the [[deity]] [[Mask]].
Ecology.Usages: A pair of tenebrous worm mandibles were valuable, worth up to 3,000 [[gold pieces]] per pair.
